entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
